pageTitle: Factors That Could Affect Safety for the Uranium Processing Facility (UPF) Project | DNFSB
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {994=1st Panel Discussion: Department of Energy – 1:40 pm-3:10 pm 2nd Panel Discussion: Babcock & Wilcox Y-12 – 3:20 pm-4:30 pm}
textBeforeTable: Hearing Record PDF Public Hearing Transcript Factors That Could Affect Safety for the Uranium Processing Facility (UPF) Project 10/2/2012 Download Type Subject Date Hearing Transcript 1st Panel Discussion: Department of Energy – 1:40 pm-3:10 pm 2nd Panel Discussion: Babcock & Wilcox Y-12 – 3:20 pm-4:30 pm Summary In this public hearing and meeting, the Board will receive testimony regarding factors that could affect the timely execution and safety of the Uranium Processing Facility (UPF) Project. The Board is postponing the hearing session concerning nuclear operations at existing Y-12 defense nuclear facilities, the effectiveness of the National Nuclear Security Administration's oversight for these activities, and the status of site-wide emergency preparedness.
